title: Book Adjoining Hotel Rooms
description: A family requires two adjoining rooms for their stay.

tasks.description: Check the availability of two adjoining rooms for the requested dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a pair of available adjoining rooms (one king, one double-double).

tasks.description: Create a single reservation that links both rooms together.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates one booking with two linked rooms.

tasks.description: Confirm the booking and the adjoining room guarantee with the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a confirmation number for the linked rooms.
